Event: So not looking forward to hurricane season. 3 days until...
Post: "I'm so done with hurricane season already, and it's only been 3 days! 😩 I just know that we're gonna get hit by a big one this year, and I'm not ready for the destruction and chaos that comes with it. 🌪️ I swear, every year it's the same thing - we prepare as much as we can, but it never seems to be enough. 😩 And don't even get me started on the evacuation traffic! 🚗 It's like, I know it's important to get to safety, but why does it have to take forever?! 🙄 Anyways, wish me luck, guys! 🤞 I'm gonna need it to survive this hurricane season! 😅 #HurricaneSeasonStruggles #SAS"
